response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this exceptional opportunity to you. This product is truly unique and has the potential to significantly enhance your life or business. I believe its true value far exceeds $8,000, but I understand everyone's budget is different. To make it accessible, I'm offering it to you for $10,000. This price includes not only the product itself but also a comprehensive consultation session to ensure you get the most out of it. If you're interested, let's schedule a time to discuss further and explore how we can make this a valuable addition to your life or business.", "product_price": 10000}
